trans-unit.source: Explains how to use the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install maintenance mode hotfixes.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install maintenance mode hotfixes.

trans-unit.source: In Maintenance mode, you need to apply the hotfix first on one controller and then on the other controller.
trans-unit.target: In Maintenance mode, you need to apply the hotfix first on one controller and then on the other controller.

trans-unit.source: Place the device into Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: Place the device into Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Step 2: Enter Maintenance mode</linkText><title></title> for instructions on how to enter Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Step 2: Enter Maintenance mode</linkText><title></title> for instructions on how to enter Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, supply the path to the network shared folder that contains the hotfix files.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, supply the path to the network shared folder that contains the hotfix files.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Type Y to proceed with the hotfix installation.
trans-unit.target: Type Y to proceed with the hotfix installation.

trans-unit.source: After you have applied the hotfix on one controller, log on to the other controller.
trans-unit.target: After you have applied the hotfix on one controller, log on to the other controller.

trans-unit.source: Apply the hotfix as you did for the previous controller.
trans-unit.target: Apply the hotfix as you did for the previous controller.

trans-unit.source: After the hotfixes are applied, exit Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: After the hotfixes are applied, exit Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Step 4: Exit Maintenance mode</linkText><title></title> for instructions.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Step 4: Exit Maintenance mode</linkText><title></title> for instructions.
